com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy

Class ExternalScenarioUnitTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.database.DBTest
      • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.ExternalScenarioUnitTest

  • public class ExternalScenarioUnitTest
extends DBTest
    This is added for testing specific scenarios which come up using the test harness.

        public void ebsad18105MissingDeploy()
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.Exception
        For some reason ipt-iias-tomcat-cfg-rpm was not deploying to tstem06 even though it was not present before the SS2 run. This caused puppet to fail, as something that depends on it could not be deployed.

        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • ebsad11307UpgradeOneOfANumberOfSmallChains

        public void ebsad11307UpgradeOneOfANumberOfSmallChains()
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Tests upgrading of a single chain which has a number of sibling chains, ie. 
         Grandaddy
   |__Daddy
      |__Child 1
        |__Grandchild 1
      |__Child 2
        |__Grandchild 2
      |__Child 3
        |__Grandchild 3
      |__Child 4                <-- This one
        |__Grandchild 4       <-- and this one as part of the same 2-part chain, say
      |__Child 5
        |__Grandchild 5
        This test checks that a. Both components of the chain are actioned and b. that the actions appear as their own transitions as defined in the deployment descriptor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
